frontMatter.title: Service history
frontMatter.description: Follow this pattern to ask users about their military service history and periods of service.
frontMatter.intro: Use this pattern when gathering information about a Veteran's periods of service in the military.

when_to_use.value: **Gathering service periods.** When forms require documentation of Veteran's periods of military service.
**Multiple service periods.** When Veterans need to add more than one service period.
**Reviewing prefilled data.** When forms allow reviewing and updating prefilled service data.

design_principles.value: **Use multiple response pattern.** When forms allow Veterans to add more than one service period.
**Some forms only need recent service.** Health care applications may only require the most recent branch of service.
**Clarify data scope.** Clearly state that any changes made to service data within the form won't change the data that VA has on file.
**Minimize POW requests.** Prisoner of War information should only be requested when absolutely necessary.

when_not_to_use.value: **Not required by form.** When service information isn't required for the application.

examples.title: Service periods
examples.description: Form collecting branch of service, start date, and end date.

examples.title: Service under another name
examples.description: Multiple response pattern for names used during service.

how_to_build.intro: Service history collection is organized into logical sections.

steps.value: **Service periods section:** Branch of service (combo box), service start date, service end date.
**Service locations section:** Place service started, place service ended (text inputs).
**Service details section:** Service number, grade/rank/rating, character of discharge, type of service.
**Service under another name:** Uses multiple responses pattern with summary review.
**Reserves and National Guard:** Obligation start/end dates, unit name.
**POW status (when required):** Period start/end dates with optional estimate hint text.

frontMatter.code_usage:
Service history patterns use combinations of form components organized into logical sections.

**Branch of service** uses a combo box with autocomplete functionality.

See the [vets-website repository](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/vets-website) for implementation details.

content_considerations.value: Use the standard branch of service list maintained by VA.
Provide hint text clarifying what information is required vs. optional.
For POW dates, include hint text that estimates are acceptable.

accessibility.value: Ensure all date fields have proper labels and are keyboard accessible.
Branch of service combo box must be screen reader friendly.
Provide clear error messages for invalid date ranges.
